ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Bard thread on our songs
ygData.msgSnippet: An excellent discussion to be sure.  Unfortunately acknowledging this would put Verant in the position of admitting they are wrong and just don t care. Good to
ygData.messageBody:
An excellent discussion to be sure. Unfortunately acknowledging this would
put Verant in the position of admitting they are wrong and just don't care.
Good to see exact numbers from an enchanter on how many mobs he can keep
mez'd forever with both Clarity and Clarity II. Seeing they could control
15 even cons long enough for an evac was an eye opener even for me. Even
before Lullaby was 'fixed' a bard would not have been able to do that. The
first one to break would likely bash him and end the song routine.

Kitasi

-----------------------------------------------------------_->

http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/009372.html

this is a very well written thread discussing the effects of constant
refreshes on our resist rates.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
